author: Claire Franken
excerpt: Here's what to watch before and after Super Bowl LIX, airing on Fox Sunday, Feb. 9.
text: We hope you hungry kids are loading up on Totino‚Äôs pizza rolls, because Fox has a robust slate of Super Bowl Sunday programming planned. Fox will be airing Super Bowl LIX, between the Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles on Sunday, Feb. 9, starting at 6:30/5:30c. But unless you were born last night, you know there‚Äôs a lot more to Super Bowl Sunday than the Big Game‚Ñ¢ itself. Super Bowl coverage actually started Feb. 3 over on FS1, with NFL Super Bowl Opening Night. Fox proper follows with its own pregame celebrations on Thursday, Feb. 6 with the NFL Honors (at 9/8c) and continues by highlighting FS1 programming on Friday. Best/Worst Shows Aired After Super Bowl Turning to Super Bowl Sunday itself, Fox‚Äôs game plan is as follows (all times Eastern): üèà 11 am: Road to the Super Bowl NFL Films‚Äô annual look back at the sights and sounds from the season gone by üèà Noon: The Madden Cruiser: A Bayou Adventure With Bill BelichickEight-time Super Bowl champion Bill Belichick hops aboard the late Hall of Fame legend John Madden‚Äôs iconic ‚ÄúMadden Cruiser‚Äù bus for an unforgettable road trip. üèà 1 pm: Fox Super Bowl LIX PregameCurt Menefee hosts over five hours of live pregame coverage that will see the Fox NFL Sunday team join the Fox NFL Kickoff cast for analysis and news. üèà 6:30 pm: Super Bowl LIXSportsmen sporting! üèà Following the game: Fox Super Bowl LIX Postgame ShowThe winning team is presented with the Lombardi Trophy. üèà 10:30 pm (approx.): The Floor Season 3 premiereThe trivia show returns as Rob Lowe quizzes contestants on their knowledge of pets, gardening, ice cream flavors, ancient history and more. üèà Local programming! Super Bowl 59 will be played at Caesars Superdome stadium in New Orleans. The competing NFL teams are the Philadelphia Eagles and defending champs Kansas City Chiefs.
html:
We hope you hungry kids are loading up on Totino‚Äôs pizza rolls, because Fox has a robust slate of Super Bowl Sunday programming planned.

Fox will be airing Super Bowl LIX, between the Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles on Sunday, Feb. 9, starting at 6:30/5:30c. But unless you were born last night, you know there‚Äôs a lot more to Super Bowl Sunday than the Big Game‚Ñ¢ itself.

Super Bowl coverage actually started Feb. 3 over on FS1, with NFL Super Bowl Opening Night. Fox proper follows with its own pregame celebrations on Thursday, Feb. 6 with the NFL Honors (at 9/8c) and continues by highlighting FS1 programming on Friday.

Best/Worst Shows Aired After Super Bowl

Turning to Super Bowl Sunday itself, Fox‚Äôs game plan is as follows (all times Eastern):

üèà 11 am: Road to the Super Bowl
NFL Films‚Äô annual look back at the sights and sounds from the season gone by

üèà Noon: The Madden Cruiser: A Bayou Adventure With Bill Belichick
Eight-time Super Bowl champion Bill Belichick hops aboard the late Hall of Fame legend John Madden‚Äôs iconic ‚ÄúMadden Cruiser‚Äù bus for an unforgettable road trip.

üèà 1 pm: Fox Super Bowl LIX Pregame
Curt Menefee hosts over five hours of live pregame coverage that will see the Fox NFL Sunday team join the Fox NFL Kickoff cast for analysis and news.

üèà 6:30 pm: Super Bowl LIX
Sportsmen sporting!

üèà Following the game: Fox Super Bowl LIX Postgame Show
The winning team is presented with the Lombardi Trophy.

üèà 10:30 pm (approx.): The Floor Season 3 premiere
The trivia show returns as Rob Lowe quizzes contestants on their knowledge of pets, gardening, ice cream flavors, ancient history and more.

üèà Local programming!

Super Bowl 59 will be played at Caesars Superdome stadium in New Orleans. The competing NFL teams are the Philadelphia Eagles and defending champs Kansas City Chiefs.
